thread.section_title: Dresslily 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslily 的点评意见 | dresslily.com
thread.title: Sam Sissiorbell
thread.title_full: Dresslily 的点评人 Sam Sissiorbell

author: Sam Sissiorbell
title: Sam Sissiorbell
text: First, their live chat is deceased you can never get a live person to ask questions second they are quick to take your money but never send what you paid for and third, it's a fly by night rip off company and the attorney general needs to investigate this company.JESSEE JAMES used a gun to rob with DRESSLILY uses the internet to fleece its customers,
